gameCredits: Made by Ahmet Soner Ozturk, Jeremy Smith, Michael Kilonzo, Raja Umer
gameIntro: Today, in the year of our lord 1137, you find yourself entering Castillo de Luna. "Welcome Evander" is written on the archway above the outside door. You think to yourself, "This place could be filled with great mysteries or great treasures". So grab your sword, sharpen your skills, and prepare to embark on an epic journey!

items.name: Candlestick
items.firstMessage: You see a candlestick, I wonder what we can do with it. It lights up the room.
items.secondMessage: Just a candlestick lights up the room still.

items.name: Note
items.firstMessage: A table sits beside the door with a piece of paper on it. It reads, "You are a fearless warrior. Defeat Evil. Find the princess".
items.secondMessage: The paper is still on the table with the same inscription. "You are a fearless warrior. Defeat Evil. Find the princess".

items.name: Key
items.firstMessage: I wonder what this key opens.

items.name: Backpack
items.firstMessage: Hey, its something to hold all of the awsome things I find.
items.secondMessage: A backpack to hold things, maybe I should get backpack!

items.name: Boots of Silence
items.secondMessage: A pair of boots still sitting here.

items.name: Necklace of Dragon Beads
items.firstMessage: Beads from a Dragon, glow brightly. Possibly used as a weapon against evil.
items.secondMessage: Beads still laying on the floor in the corner.

items.name: Gloves
items.firstMessage: Gloves of Pure Power, used to attack harder.
items.secondMessage: The gloves are still crossed on the chair ready for use.

messages.5: There is nothing in that direction.
